About the Company: Sujana Universal Inds. Ltd works under the following five divisions:Appliances Division,Bearings,The Castings Division and Trading division- The division takes up trading in steel and steel products.The product range of the company includes Appliances,Ceiling Fans,Ventilation Fans,Table Fans,Pedestal Fans,Wall mount Fans and Exhaust fans.The product range of the LEC Division for Bearings consists of:Deep groove Ball Bearings in 6000, 6200, 6300 series including variations such as metallic shields, rubber seals, groove on outer ring, taper bore etc., The company also manufactures Size Resistant Ball Bearings.Taper roller bearings in metric and inch series.Ingots- These ingots are used to make final re-rolled products and Tower components..The company also in the business segment of Steel Products, Appliances Division, Light Engineering Components (Lec) Division.
